attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
add my voice to objection of listing Plymouth Civic Cente  
  £40,000,000 on top of their already high tax, to tart it up.  For one of the poorest cities in the country, unacceptable. better to pull it down regardless and pay the fine.

rejection.details: The title of a petition should be a request for action, not your name.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
